name: Stockholm - Look Inside! Meditation Workshop with Santhi
description:
Meditation is effortless existence. Observation is the key to opening our inner world. When one allows the mind to flow to the inner world, continuously for a long period of time, one is said to be in meditation. 

In this workshop, Santhi will help you understand:

- Who the observer is and who is observed

- How to get started with observation and

- How observation becomes meditation. 

Find your inner peace and free yourselves from the bondage created by your own mind.

Contact: Ingrid Bergstrand on ingridbergstrand@ymail.com to reserve your spot.

Let us join together, LOOK INSIDE and MEDITATE to find our own inner peace!
